name: MEC Parkway Light Set
description: Stay visible on those low-light commutes. The Parkway Set bundles 2 compact and efficient LED bike lights, 1 front and 1 back. With this powerful duo, you're ready to roll from dusk til dawn.Headlight has 4 modes: high (5 hours at 110 lumens), medium (10 hours at 50 lumens), low (20 hours at 25 lumens) and flash (30 hours).Tail light has 3 modes a steady mode – 36 hours, slow flash – 88 hours and quick flash – 75 hours runtime.Both lights use easy to find AAA batteries.Both lights use a tool-free strap mount that's easy to connect to your bike.O-ring seal makes this light ready for heavy rain – it's waterproof, but not submersible.
